subject: Economy
question_en: What is the role of the Reserve Bank of India?
question_hi: रिवास्ट बैंक ऑफ इंडीज़न का क्या काम है?
explanation_en: The Reserve Bank of India plays the role of implementing monetary policy.
explanation_hi: रिवास्ट बैंक ऑफ इंडीज़न मॉनेटरी प्रणाम का कार्य में शामिता होती है।

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the role of inflation in the economy?
A_en: Inflation is a measure of overall change in prices
B_en: It influences purchasing power of consumers
explanation_en: Inflation affects production and consumption directly, as it increases prices, which leads to a decrease in the demand for goods and services, ultimately affecting production and consumption
